name: CarBoom!!
description:
Made in 1 hour for Zero Hour Game Jam 2021 https://itch.io/jam/zero-hour-game-jam-2021

"Hey Yo! You must be the new guy, My names Drew, Im your supervisor here at Bobs parking service. your first job is to park that there RED car in the marked parking space. If you do that in a timely manor you might just get to stick around here!
Oh and I forgot to mention, We dont have the keys to get in the car, I do however have a pile of DYNAMITE out back that you can use!
DONT SCRATCH THE CUSTOMERS CAR TOO MUCH!"

Made my Damien S Fear and Sid!

Features include

  • realistic tarmac
  • no parking fines
  • Super accurate physics!
  • realistic petrol smell

Post Jam bug fixes
Jam rules allow 2 game breaking bug fixes post jam.

1.  win message not triggering sometimes
2. Restart button not always working
